home.headerText: We are an agile software company specializing in web and mobile applications

aboutUs.subheader: This is the best time to start collaboration with experienced and reliable partner. Someone like us, who will analyze the needs, advise and guide you through the entire development process, ensuring high quality of services and respecting deadlines and budget.

webApps.title: Custom web applications
webApps.text: We build web-based applications that help you automate your business or streamline your organization processes.

mobileApps.title: Custom mobile apps
mobileApps.text: Smart devices are the big thing today. We can support you in reaching out to your customers who live in the Internet of Things.

teams.title: Team Leasing
teams.text: We can support you with a specially appointed development team. We adjust the size and skills of the team to match your needs.

projects.text: Projects delivered on time and on budget

developers.text: Developers with many years of experience

careers.subheader: We believe only talented people can help us push the projects forward. We're waiting for you to share your energy, enthusiasm, experience, and ideas. Visit us and have a chat. See how mutual trust and freedom are the base of our creativity and efficiency. See what we believe in and how we work. Join our Speednet team.

aboutUs.subHeader: Custom software development and team leasing
aboutUs.descriptionTitle: Have an idea for an app? Need a system to increase your company’s efficiency? Your business needs to grow through new technology solutions?
aboutUs.description: This is the moment when you need a reliable and experienced technology partner who will not only analyze your idea but will also advice and lead you through the whole development process providing high quality services in the set time and budget.

jobs.description_1: We believe only talented people can help us push the projects forward. We’re waiting for you to share your energy, enthusiasm, experience, and ideas. Visit us and have a chat. See how mutual trust and freedom are the base of our creativity and efficiency.
jobs.description_2: See what we believe in and how we work. Join our Speednet team.
jobs.description_3: You can send your CV to

popPankki.title: Pop Pankki
popPankki.text: A mobile application integrating banking and insurance services from 26 banks in Finland.

pzu.title: PZU Cash
pzu.text: Web system for allocating cash loans to employees. Able to generate loans in real time.

telia.title: Telia Company
telia.text: Business platform to manage e-mail accounts, share contacts, notes and notifications with all the members of the company.

saar.title: SAAR Landesbank
saar.text: A complete digital transformation process for a French-German regional bank.

cookies.description: You can block them by changing your browser settings.
